CLIENT: HEINEKEN

CAMPAIGN: HEINEKEN RUGBY CLUB

THE PROJECT

I worked on a programmatic campaign for Heineken Rugby Club as the lead developer. I was in charge of integrating our Adobe Animate files with DoubleClick studio and ensuring they had dynamic capabilities. This meant hooking up our files to the HTML5 enabler along with a Google spreadsheet, which held all our different copy rotations. As we were using dynamic text fields this meant including web-fonts which led to lots of browser testing. It was a challenging campaign but extremely valuable and I gained a lot of new knowledge. A Senior Developer was on hand to oversee the project and assist whenever necessary.

INVOLVEMENT

  • LEAD DEVELOPER ON PROJECT
  • ANIMATION
  • FILE-SIZE MANAGEMENT
  • BROWSER TESTING
  • DOUBLECLICK STUDIO
